trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref uid="langword_csharp_DrawItem" name="DrawItem" href=""></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il metodo che gestirà il <xref uid="langword_csharp_DrawItem" name="DrawItem" href=""> </xref> evento di un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"> </xref>, o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando si crea un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs>delegato, si identifica il metodo che gestirà l'evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Per associare l'evento al gestore eventi, aggiungere un'istanza del delegato all'evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Il gestore eventi viene chiamato ogni volta che si verifica l'evento, a meno che non venga rimosso il delegato.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sui delegati del gestore eventi, vedere [eventi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
